item.description:
Dear All,

Luba Evans is hosting my good friend and colleague Laurie Handlers on Oct 28th in watertown. If you have already RSVPed on her MeetUp, there is no need to RSVP here. I am posting it here as well to help get the information out! (If you RSVP here, please do NOT pay online. Bring cash or check to the venue.

I will be going. Hope to see you there!
Brynn

With great pleasure I would like to invite you to an evening with Laurie Handlers, the founder of Butterfly Tantra. We will open the evening by welcoming Laurie to our community and synchronizing our "tantric brain waves" in unexpected spontaneous ways. :).

Laurie is offering a treat for us, teaching one of her favorite techniques Latihan.
This is a message from her:

Latihan/Bodyhan

One of the techniques used in Tantra in order to learn the self-generation of pleasure is called Latihan. Latihan is a meditation techniques from the Sabud (an Indonesian religious group). Translated, it means “following inner guidance”.

In Latihan you stand silently and “open” to existence. Energy flows through you, taking any form, such as laughing, dancing, singing, crying.

Anything can happen!

Join Laurie as she instructs us in Latihan. Later we’ll go deeper using it as a Tantric healing modality!

7:30 to 9:30
The cost of this workshop is $25
This workshop is open to all levels,
item.name: An Evening of Tantric Latihan/Bodyhan with Laurie Handlers
